Interface LocalServiceClientFactory.ReaderStep

    public static interface LocalServiceClientFactory.ReaderStep

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalServiceClientFactory.BuilderStep withoutReaderObservation()
      Do not activates the observation of the local reader events.
